mapper.insert: insert into t_book (book_name, author, t_book.type, price, press, t_book.number, isbn, cover, t_book.describe,lend_number) values (#{bookName}, #{author}, #{type}, #{price}, #{press}, #{number}, #{isbn}, #{cover},#{describe},#{lendNumber})
mapper.update:
update t_book
book_name=#{bookName},
author=#{author},
price=#{price},
t_book.type=#{type},
press=#{press},
t_book.number=#{number},
isbn=#{isbn},
cover=#{cover},
t_book.describe=#{describe}
t_book.lend_number=#{lendNumber}
where book_id=#{bookId}
mapper.select: select book_id, book_name, author, b.type,type_name, price, press, number, isbn, cover, b.describe,lend_number from t_book as b left join t_type as t on b.`type`=t.`id` where book_id=#{bookId}

select count(book_id) from t_book as b
